name: 62/R5 COZY, SUNNY ROOM. CENTER OF BOSTON BU/BC/MIT
neighborhood_overview: BU \ BC\NORTHEASTERN UNIVERSITY \ HARVARD \ MIT. This is a beautiful, newly renovated house in the middle of Boston. It is 5 min walk distance to the MBTA public transportation, the GREEN LINE which takes you to everywhere from MIT to Harvard! There is a full option kitchen with washer/dryer inside the house! The neighborhood is very safe and surrounded by the best restaurants and venues,taverns. House is very close to TJMAX l, Marshals, Target, Star market, B fresh, and ex.s
